definition: Panzhihua prefecture-level city in the south of Sichuan
kapok (tree)
to climb (by pulling oneself up)/to implicate/to claim connections of higher status
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
Panzhihua prefecture level city in south Sichuan, bordering Yunnan, famous for steel production and pollution
Panzhihua prefecture in south Sichuan, bordering Yunnan

sentences.english: Studies of the biodiversity and the sustainability of biotic resources in panzhihua sichuan p. r. c.
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花市生物多樣性與生物資源可持續性分析。

sentences.english: Abstract; Determinations of the major nutrient components of wild Bombax malabaricum DC.
sentences.chinese: 對攀枝花的基本營養成分作了較爲全面的分析測定。

sentences.english: How many times have you been to Panzhihua?
Best wishes for a successful co-operation between Buckland Overseas Education Group and No. 2 Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 願攀枝花市第二中學與巴克蘭海外教育集團合作成功。

sentences.english: Present situation is described of comprehensive utilization of Panzhihua Mine's resources of vanadium, titanium and iron.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了攀枝花釩鈦鐵資源的利用現狀。

sentences.english: Do Pan Zhi Hua City Ren He District have the computer city?
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花仁和區有沒有電腦城啊？

sentences.english: It is definitely a winter resort.
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花肯定是一個“避冬”聖地。

sentences.english: I stayed in Panzhihua for some time.
sentences.chinese: 我在攀枝花呆了一段時間了。

sentences.english: More than ninety-four percent of the winter days are sunny.
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花冬天94%以上的時間都是豔陽天。

sentences.english: Luckily, Panzhihua city does have all the three kinds of resources.
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花市擁有這三類資源。

sentences.english: Climate of Panzhihua and solar energy application are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹攀枝花市的氣候條件及太陽能應用現狀。

sentences.english: In addition, buses from Panzhihua to Kunming depart every 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 另外，從攀枝花到昆明的巴士大約20分鐘一班。

sentences.english: It has obscure four seasons and clear rainy and dry seasons.
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花四季界限不分明，但是有明顯的雨季和乾季。

sentences.english: You can go to PanZhihua railway station by No. 64.
sentences.chinese: 乘64路公共汽車可以到攀枝花火車站。

sentences.english: Panzhihua city water-saving irrigation planning I participate in is to be no exception.
sentences.chinese: 我所參與的攀枝花市節水灌溉規劃分區也不例外。
